thread.section_title: FreedomVoice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FreedomVoice | www.freedomvoice.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: Mark Thomas

author: Mark Thomas
title: Mark Thomas
text: I have been using the service for several years now and have not had a complaint. The operation has been flawless and I can't be happier. If I ever have questions, the customer service is answered by a person and they always have the answers! I also find the cost to be very affordable compared to the competition that I have checked out. All in all a must have service!
